Key Match Events: Tyler Herro recorded game highs of 27 points and nine assists before being ejected.
Nikola Jovic’s 3-pointer gave Miami a 98-94 lead.
Fred VanVleet was ejected for arguing a five-second call.
A skirmish led to the ejection of Tyler Herro, Amen Thompson, Terry Rozier, and Jalen Green.
Rockets head coach Ime Udoka and assistant Ben Sullivan were also ejected.
Nikola Jovic tacked on two free throws after the chaos to help Miami close out the win.
Dillon Brooks scored a team-high 22 points for Houston.
Alperen Sengun added 18 points and 18 rebounds.
Jalen Green scored 19 points before his ejection.
